questions.question: What is the time complexity of Binary Search?
questions.explanation: Binary Search has O(log n) time complexity as it halves the search space in each iteration.

questions.question: Which search algorithm requires the data to be sorted?
questions.explanation: Binary Search requires sorted data to efficiently halve the search space.

questions.question: Linear Search can be used on linked lists.
questions.explanation: Linear Search works on any sequential data structure, including linked lists, with O(n) time complexity.
